title: Bloomberg Businessweek Weekend - August 3rd, 2019
itunes:title: Bloomberg Businessweek Weekend - August 3rd, 2019
description:
Hosted by Jason Kelly and Taylor Riggs

Featuring highlights from the latest issue of Bloomberg Businessweek.

-Jordyn Holman explains why Victoria’s Secret has more than a Jeffrey Epstein problem-Sarah McBride details how Sequoia’s first woman partner is raising capital, and standards-Felix Gillette previews the streaming video-on-demand war coming in 2020-Max Chafkin profiles Lance Armstrong and his quest for redemption

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
